scrapper package

Submodules

scrapper.scrapper module

scrapper.scrapper.fake_db_upload(deveui: str, rssi: str, value: int)[source]

Buffer function that prepares the data for the next record in the database.

Parameters:

  • deveui (str) – The deveui of the device.

  • rssi (str) – The rssi of the device.

  • value (int) – The value of the device.

scrapper.scrapper.on_connect(client: Client, userdata, flags, rc: int)[source]

The callback for when the client receives a CONNACK response from the server.

scrapper.scrapper.on_message(client: Client, userdata, msg: str)[source]

The callback for when a PUBLISH message is received from the server.

Parameters:

  • client (mqtt.Client) – The client instance for this callback.

  • userdata – The private user data as set in Client() or userdata_set().

  • msg (str) – An instance of MQTTMessage. This is a class with members topic, payload, qos, retain.

scrapper.scrapper.real_db_upload()[source]

Upload the data to the database. This function is called every 10 seconds.

scrapper.scrapper.run()[source]

Run the MQTT client.

Module contents
